title: Welcome to DelibGraph
text:
You’re viewing a real discussion from an online deliberation platform. Instead of scrolling through a long thread, this Knowledge Graph shows how ideas connect—so you can spot patterns, tensions, and shared themes.

An AI helps by analysing the debate and suggesting clusters and keywords. AI can make mistakes—use node details to verify, question, or contest what you see.

title: Start from the Subject
text: The Subject is the main topic. Use it as your anchor: every position and argument links back to this core question.

title: Compare Positions
text: Positions are the main viewpoints participants take. Use them to compare perspectives at a glance and see how the debate branches.

title: Read the Arguments
text:
Arguments are human contributions written in response to a position. Each author self-classified their contribution as supporting (IN FAVOR) or challenging (AGAINST) that position.

Tip: Click a node to read details and trace the contribution back to its source.

title: Discover Thematic Clusters
text: Clusters (background areas) are created by AI. It analyses argument content and groups them into themes, helping you notice recurrent concepts across the debate.

title: Follow Shared Keywords
text:
Keywords are relevant terms the AI selected from each argument. When the same term appears across different arguments, it becomes a concept bridge showing where multiple contributions touch the same idea.

Follow keywords to compare how that concept is used in different parts of the debate.

title: Connections at a Glance
text: Node Size reflects how much discussion an element generates: larger nodes received more arguments contributions. Size can highlight hotspots, but every position deserves attention, use it as a clue, not a ranking.

title: Now Explore
text:
You’re ready. Try these moves:

• Click nodes to read details and trace sources.
• Use the Timeline to replay how the debate unfolds.
• Use Filters to surface contested areas, shared keywords, or lone voices.
• Add Personal notes to capture insights and link what you find.
